lines.text: I have a future that I must change.
I will become unbeatable, like any other.
Truth and Ideals. Yin and Yang. Zekrom and Reshiram.
To you they may only see these two as legendarys for your collection.
However, if these two were gone, Kyurem would cover the world in ice. They keep balance in the world.
I remember the Pokemon I frist had...a Darmanitan, a Woobat, and my Zoura.
The bonds you make with these creatures are truly amazing!
And no matter how many times you start your journey, you're always making new bonds with your Pokemon!
